name: Serpentfolk of Yig
languages: Abyssal, Common, Draconic, Infernal, Void Speech

actions.desc: The serpentfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its scimitar.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Scimitar

actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortbow

special_abilities.desc: The serpentfolk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
